full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LHA MCHOG RNAMS LA DGA' BAR BYED PA'I BSANGS MCHOD BCU GSUM MU TIG PHRENG BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @013A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI LHA MCHOG RNAMS LA BSANGS MCHOD BCU GSUM 'BUL BAR DGOS ZHES DON GNYER CAN MANG POS BSKUL BA'I CHED DU, SNGON GYI MKHAS PA'I DPE RNYING LA GTUGS TE, AA RING LAS BYUNG BA'I MDO STOD KYI JO NI MGON PO'I SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG GRAGS PA BSHAD SGRUB KYIS, ,SA PHYOGS YUL KHAMS THAMS CAD DGA' BAR BYED PA'I PHYIR TU DGE LDAN CHOS 'KHOR GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,BKRA SHIS PA DANG DGE BA 'PHEL GYUR CIG , ,,)
